title: Button, late 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Button ornamented with fragments of pearl shell set in a band around a central depression having two holes for sewing.

On card 2

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Pearl shell and wood. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-400-c.
